about_the_game:
Yes, you read that right: FREE DEMO! Nubs! is letting you jump headfirst into the chaos without spending a single shiny coin. Sound too good to be true? Probably. But Konzumos the Unentertained is feeling generous today, so here’s your chance to try out this absurd PvP arena brawler absolutely free. The only string attached is that you need to have 4 players in the game to play, so invite your friends, or maybe some strangers from the internet who could be your friends or worst enemies after a game of Nubs!

In this preview, you’ll clash with your friends in lightning-fast multiplayer battles packed with traps, fish-flinging madness, and the kind of chaotic fun you didn’t realize you were craving. It’s basically the full Nubs! experience, minus some weapons, maps, game modes, and polish that are being carefully handcrafted for the full release (you’re welcome).

Here’s what Konzumos is offering, at no cost to your wallet:

  • Replayable chaotic multiplayer fun: Party up in the living room or online with friends, or foes, because why not?

  • Trap-filled arenas: Dodge hazards, fling ridiculous pick-ups, and watch your friends fall victim to your perfectly placed shenanigans.

  • Roguelite progression: Unlock silly gear and absurd power-ups as you battle to become the ultimate Nub. No two matches are ever the same!

  • Laughs guaranteed (or your $0 back): Where else can you weaponize fish or meet a god whose only demand is to be amused?

Don’t miss this once-in-a-lifetime chance to be scammed in reverse: fun at zero cost! Download the Nubs! demo today and prove you’ve got what it takes to become Konzumos’ favorite. And if you like it, the full game is coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“Nubs aims to deliver fast-paced, arena-based battles for up to four players, fighting in chaotic brawls using quirk-based characters, daft weapons, and lethal traps–and it looks pretty damn great.”
Forbes

“Nubs! is a multiplayer brawler. Not like Smash Bros, mind you. Looking at it, it reminds me of The Legend of Zelda: Four Swords.”
Destructoid

“Awesomenauts devs reclaim their unfinished game as new studio Rangatang”
GamesIndustry
short_description: Fast, frantic, and full of surprises, four-player battles in Nubs! never go as planned! Risk it all for the mighty Konzumos' delight in this arena brawler and smash the others to nublivion in your quest for glory! Simple rules? Check. Roguelite progression? Sure. Predictability? No way!
